instructors.name: CA Rachana Ranade
instructors.bio: A Chartered Accountant by profession and a teacher by passion, Rachana Ranade has been on a mission to make financial education accessible to everyone in the simplest language possible.

instructors.name: Amit Sharma
instructors.bio: Amit is a seasoned market expert with over 15 years of experience in technical analysis and derivatives trading. He specializes in creating actionable trading strategies.

courses.title: Basics of Stock Market
what_you_will_learn: Understand how the stock market works.
Learn key terminologies like Sensex, Nifty, Bull, and Bear.
How to open a Demat & Trading account.
Place your first buy and sell orders with confidence.

courses.title: Mastering Money Management
what_you_will_learn: Create a personal budget that works.
Implement powerful savings and debt-reduction strategies.
Understand your financial health and set achievable goals.

courses.title: Magic of Mutual Funds
what_you_will_learn: Understand the fundamentals of mutual funds.
Learn to select the right fund for your goals.
Master the art of building a diversified portfolio.

courses.title: Fundamental Analysis
what_you_will_learn: Read financial statements like a professional.
Calculate and interpret key financial ratios.
Perform industry and economic analysis.
Value a company to find its intrinsic worth.

courses.title: Technical Analysis
what_you_will_learn: Master candlestick patterns and chart reading.
Use technical indicators like RSI, MACD, and Moving Averages.
Identify trends, support, and resistance levels.
Develop your own trading strategies.

courses.title: Futures and Options
what_you_will_learn: Understand the mechanics of derivatives.
Learn key option greeks (Delta, Gamma, Theta, Vega).
Implement various options strategies like straddles and spreads.
Manage risk in F&O trading.

courses.title: Art of Value Investing
what_you_will_learn: Learn the principles of legendary investors.
Identify undervalued stocks with strong fundamentals.
Build a long-term portfolio based on value.
Understand the concept of 'Margin of Safety'.

courses.title: Pro Investor Membership (Marathi)
what_you_will_learn: Deep dive into stock market analysis in Marathi.
Weekly market analysis sessions.
Exclusive access to a Marathi-speaking community.

courses.title: Beginner's Combo Pack
what_you_will_learn: A complete foundation in personal finance, mutual funds, and the stock market.

courses.title: Analysis Pro Pack
what_you_will_learn: Master both fundamental and technical analysis to become a well-rounded investor.

blogs.excerpt: An emergency fund is your financial safety net. Learn how much you need, where to keep it, and why it's non-negotiable.

blogs.excerpt: An annual report is a goldmine of information if you know where to look. Learn how to analyze them to make better investment choices.

blogs.excerpt: Debt funds are a safer investment alternative to equities. Understand how they work and if they are a right fit for your portfolio.

blogs.excerpt: Price action trading involves making all of your trading decisions from a stripped down or 'naked' price chart.

testimonials.name: Aarav Sharma
testimonials.quote: Rachana ma'am simplifies the most complex topics. I finally feel confident about my investments. The live Q&A sessions are a game-changer!

testimonials.name: Priya Singh
testimonials.quote: The community support is amazing. Being able to ask questions and learn with others has been a game-changer for me. Best decision I ever made!

testimonials.name: Rohan Mehta
testimonials.quote: I thought I knew enough about finance, but the membership content opened my eyes to so much more. The downloadable notes are pure gold. Worth every penny!

testimonials.name: Sneha Gupta
testimonials.quote: As a working professional, the flexible learning schedule is perfect. I can learn anytime, anywhere. The content is practical and easy to apply.

testimonials.name: Vikram Rathod
testimonials.quote: The Futures and Options course is intense but incredibly rewarding. The strategies taught are practical and have improved my trading results.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your monthly or yearly subscription at any time from your account dashboard. You will retain access until the end of your current billing period.

faqs.question: Are the courses live or pre-recorded?
faqs.answer: All our courses are pre-recorded with high-quality videos, allowing you to learn at your own pace. However, we conduct exclusive live Q&A webinars for our Yearly and Lifetime members.

faqs.question: What happens after I purchase a plan?
faqs.answer: You will get instant access to all the membership benefits corresponding to your plan. You can start learning immediately through your personal dashboard.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day no-questions-asked refund policy. If you are not satisfied with the course for any reason, you can request a full refund within 7 days of your purchase.

faqs.question: Will I get a certificate after completing a course?
faqs.answer: Yes, upon successful completion of any course, you will receive a downloadable certificate of completion that you can share on your professional networks like LinkedIn.

faqs.question: Are there any prerequisites for the beginner courses?
faqs.answer: No, our beginner courses are designed for absolute beginners. All you need is a willingness to learn. We start from the very basics and build up from there.

faqs.question: How long do I have access to the courses?
faqs.answer: Once you purchase a course or a membership plan, you have lifetime access to the content, including all future updates and additions to those courses.

faqs.question: Can I watch the courses on my mobile device?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Our platform is fully responsive, and courses are accessible on a wide range of devices, including Android phones, iPhones, Windows PCs, and MacOS laptops.

faqs.question: How is the community support provided?
faqs.answer: Our community support is provided through a private, dedicated chat group where you can interact with fellow students, ask questions, and participate in discussions moderated by our team.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, UPI, and popular digital wallets.
